I loved October Sky. The thing I loved most had to be the music. It worked two ways: in the first hour of the film, it gives off a sense of hunger competition between friends and unlikeliness of acceptance by women. It is strange indeed what effect a piece of music can have upon us in profound ways like love and hate and how people get angry

Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: Hateokuyo no ki (The Tree at the Hateto) and Mimiwanjia no nakijou (Three Little Things).
Part one deals with Writer Miyazawa as he faces harsh conditions during his short stay on his family farm in Iwate prefecture.
